name: Strawberries and Cream
description: The season's first strawberries always made an appearance on the Swedish Midsummer table. Make them stand out with some cool, freshly whipped cream.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, beat heavy cream with an electric beater until soft peaks form. Add confectioner's sugar and continue to beat until cream is fluffy with stiff peaks. Serve alongside berries.
